text: The Eredivisie is a football league which is the top division in the Netherlands. It was created in 1956. Before 1956, the teams competed in the Netherlands Football League Championship. The most successful team has been AFC Ajax, with 36 titles. At the end of the 2014–15 season, the Eredivisie was ranked the 10th best league in the Europe. == Clubs 2014–15 == * ADO Den Haag * Ajax * AZ * SC Cambuur * FC Groningen * FC Twente * FC Utrecht * Go Ahead Eagles * PEC Zwolle * Feyenoord * Heracles Almelo * NAC Breda * Excelsior * PSV Eindhoven * FC Dordrecht * Willem II * SC Heerenveen * Vitesse == Champions == Season Champions Runner-up Third place 2000/01 PSV Eindhoven Feyenoord Rotterdam Ajax 2001/02 Ajax PSV Eindhoven Feyenoord Rotterdam 2002/03 PSV Eindhoven Ajax Feyenoord Rotterdam 2003/04 Ajax PSV Eindhoven Feyenoord Rotterdam 2004/05 PSV Eindhoven Ajax AZ Alkmaar 2005/06 PSV Eindhoven AZ Alkmaar Feyenoord Rotterdam 2006/07 PSV Eindhoven Ajax AZ Alkmaar 2007/08 PSV Eindhoven Ajax NAC Breda 2008/09 AZ Alkmaar FC Twente Ajax 2009/10 FC Twente Ajax PSV Eindhoven 2010/11 Ajax FC Twente PSV Eindhoven 2011/12 Ajax Feyenoord Rotterdam PSV Eindhoven 2012/13 Ajax PSV Eindhoven Feyenoord Rotterdam 2013/14 Ajax Feyenoord Rotterdam FC Twente 2014/15 PSV Eindhoven Ajax AZ Alkmaar === Former champions === ==References== Category:Football leagues in Europe Category:Football in the Netherlands Category:1956 establishments in the Netherlands
title: Eredivisie
